metadata.title: Bering Sea Groundfish Database 1981

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: To provide resource assessment estimates for management. Also includes biological data for additional studies and environmental data.
